title: American Horror Story Weekly Wednesday Live Stream + Netflix Show Reviews
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: Mary, when you do your searches, you should always click "tools" underneath the bar, and change "Any time" to within the "past week" or "past 24 hrs" etc. so that you only see the most recent articles

Catching the replay Mary!!! Hope you are well!!! Im in mid video and wasn't sure if you had mentioned the winners of your giveaway? I hadn't received anything yet and was just wondering.  I love crime stuff too!!! Will look forward to your stream Friday!! 💕💕💕
We also enjoyed the show You also. Netflix picked it up for 2nd season

There's speculation that Kathy Bates might be seriously ill right now. She lost 60 pounds rather fast and it's concerning people given that she is a cancer survivor. And I thought I remember hearing that Evan Peters' health is poor as well, which is why he wasn't featured as much in AHS lately. And if I recall correctly, Cody Fern wants to take a break from acting. I'm sad about all of this.
